A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was disappointed by TLJ. The stakes weren't raised in any way. Both sides\, the Resistance and First Order\, were incompetent and defied any logic or strategy in execution of their plans. My take with the elephant in the room...I didn't mind Luke's death but where was his goodbye to Rey and Leia? There was no 'The Force will be with you' and the movie ended just as abruptly.
